verses.plain: Set the trumpet to thy mouth. He shall come as an eagle against the house of the LORD, because they have transgressed my covenant, and trespassed against my law.

tokens.t: the trumpet to thy mouth.

verses.plain: Israel shall cry unto me, My God, we know thee.

tokens.t: Israel shall cry unto me, My God, we know thee.

verses.plain: Israel hath cast off the thing that is good: the enemy shall pursue him.

tokens.t: Israel hath cast off
good: the enemy shall pursue him.

verses.plain: They have set up kings, but not by me: they have made princes, and I knew it not: of their silver and their gold have they made them idols, that they may be cut off.

tokens.t: They have set up kings, but not by me: they have made princes, and I knew
not: of their silver and their gold have they made them idols, that they may be cut off.

verses.plain: ¶ Thy calf, O Samaria, hath cast thee off; mine anger is kindled against them: how long will it be ere they attain to innocency?

verses.plain: For from Israel was it also: the workman made it; therefore it is not God: but the calf of Samaria shall be broken in pieces.

it also: the workman made it; therefore it

verses.plain: For they have sown the wind, and they shall reap the whirlwind: it hath no stalk: the bud shall yield no meal: if so be it yield, the strangers shall swallow it up.

tokens.t: For they have sown the wind, and they shall reap the whirlwind: it hath no stalk: the bud shall yield no meal: if so be it yield, the strangers shall swallow it up.

verses.plain: Israel is swallowed up: now shall they be among the Gentiles as a vessel wherein is no pleasure.

tokens.t: Israel is swallowed up: now shall they be among the Gentiles as a vessel wherein
no pleasure.

verses.plain: For they are gone up to Assyria, a wild ass alone by himself: Ephraim hath hired lovers.

tokens.t: For they are gone up to Assyria, a wild ass alone by himself: Ephraim hath hired lovers.

verses.plain: Yea, though they have hired among the nations, now will I gather them, and they shall sorrow a little for the burden of the king of princes.

tokens.t: Yea, though they have hired among the nations, now will I gather them, and they shall sorrow a little for the burden of the king of princes.

verses.plain: Because Ephraim hath made many altars to sin, altars shall be unto him to sin.

tokens.t: Because Ephraim hath made many altars to sin, altars shall be unto him to sin.

verses.plain: I have written to him the great things of my law, but they were counted as a strange thing.

tokens.t: I have written to him the great things of my law,
they were counted as a strange thing.

verses.plain: They sacrifice flesh for the sacrifices of mine offerings, and eat it; but the LORD accepteth them not; now will he remember their iniquity, and visit their sins: they shall return to Egypt.

verses.plain: For Israel hath forgotten his Maker, and buildeth temples; and Judah hath multiplied fenced cities: but I will send a fire upon his cities, and it shall devour the palaces thereof.
